PyAMS Library
  • Simulation
  • Edit on GitHub

Simulation

The simulation of analog circuits by means of PyAMS can be performed in three different domains:

  • Quiescent domain, i.e. direct current analysis (dc) mode;

  • Time-domain, i.e. transient analysis (tran) mode;

  • Operating-points, i.e. operating-points analysis (op) mode;

Transient analysis

the tran analysis by PyAMS is analysis of the circuits during the time it changes from one steady state condition to another steady state condition.

Direct Current analysis

The dc analysis is gets the operation of the circuit by variation one parameter in turns (e.g., the resistor value, current value, voltage value, temperature value, etc.). In this analysis, the nonlinear dynamic signals are replaced by sources with a zero value.

Operating-Points analysis

the op analysis by PyAMS is find operating points in the circuit for time=0.
